name: Support Base SPRL
goal: To support dialogue between EU policy-makers, policy-formers and the wider stakeholder community, through the  organising of seminars, conferences, debates, meetings and exhibitions on various topics/issues, mainly in the healthcare, health provision and pharmaceutical sectors. As a business we have been working with various sponsoring MEPs across all political groups since 2005 - both in the European Parliament and externally. We are an independent event business dedicated to dialogue with the EU affairs community.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We are often retained to implement events in support of specific topics and policy areas - the most recent being around the following policy areas. Smoking cessation, understanding Lung Health in Europe, Tuberculosis in Europe, World Sight Day exhibition and dinner debate, Cervical Cancer MEP/Stakeholder Summit and Disruptive Innovation in Healthcare.
